thread.title: Southampton road to be shut for days
thread.title_full: Southampton road to be shut for days

title: Southampton road to be shut for days
text:
Winchester Road in Southampton will be partially closed for gas works Southampton road to be shut for days 1 comment 
DELAYS are expected for days on a Southampton road as gas works are carried out. 
SGN Gas have today begun essential upgrades to the gas main in Winchester Road, closing the lane by the junction of Hill Lane, with a section of that road also shut off. 
In a statement on SGN's website, the company said: “We are very sorry for the inconvenience caused and would like to thank road users for their patience while we carry out this essential upgrade work.” Share article 
The work is expected to take approximately four days. 
By Will Rimell Winchester Road in Southampton will be partially closed for gas works Sorry, an error occurred.
